nodes.text: P4T-GM was a red-and-white-plated P4T protocol droid that was overworked as a conflict resolver in the criminal Pyke Syndicate's spice mines on the planet Kessel during the reign of the Galactic Empire. In 10 BBY, P4T-GM was freed from slavery when its restraining bolt was removed during a slave revolt in the mines started by the droid L3-37.

P4T-GM first appeared in the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story and was first identified in the accompanying reference book Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
